quote.#text:
A bill to authorize a settlement in accordance with the agreement entered into by the Tennessee
			 Valley Authority and the United States Department of the Interior, and
			 counties within the Great Smoky Mountains National Park.

official-title-amendment.#text: Amend the title so as to read:

official-title.#text:
To authorize payment of funds in accordance with the agreement entered into by the Tennessee Valley
			 Authority, the State of North Carolina, Swain County, North Carolina, and
			 the United States Department of the Interior.
